my_business: At Luxtales, we specialize in professional photography and videography services, catering to a wide array of needs. From corporate events and brand storytelling to lifestyle content and destination shoots, we create visuals that inspire and captivate.

We’ve handled events of all scales — from national-level business summits to intimate lifestyle shoots — with the same level of precision and storytelling quality.
ideal_referral: Brand managers, event agencies, corporate communication heads, wedding planners, and designers who value high-quality visual storytelling for weddings, corporate branding, product launches, or lifestyle content. We are trusted by BNI at both national and regional levels — having served as the official media partner for BNI India National Conference 2025 (Kochi) and BNI Mesmerize (Trivandrum). We’re the go-to team for: • South Indian & destination weddings • Corporate branding visuals • Editorial & lifestyle shoots for premium brands • Visual content creation for hospitality, fashion, and design industries
top_problem_solved: We help brands and event organizers elevate their visual presence through impactful films and photography that capture attention and emotion. We solve the challenge of uninspiring visuals by crafting cinematic stories that connect with audiences and strengthen brand identity. We transform complex events and brand moments into visually stunning narratives that drive engagement and recall. We bridge the gap between creative vision and flawless execution, delivering visuals that truly represent your brand’s essence. We help clients struggling with inconsistent brand visuals achieve cohesive, high-quality storytelling across platforms.
my_favourite_bni_story: Being chosen as the media partner for the BNI India National Conference 2025, held in Kochi, was a landmark moment in our BNI journey. We were also proud to be the official media partner for BNI Mesmerize, the annual celebration of BNI Trivandrum Region. At both events, we delivered cinematic event coverage and real-time photo access using our AI-based system. It gave us a platform to showcase our work to hundreds of entrepreneurs while also strengthening brand recall and trust across the BNI network.

name: Krishna Aravind
company_address: Trivandrum Kozhikode Thrissur Ernakulam
my_business: Established with a vision to empower businesses by streamlining their operations, FINMANNPROBUSINESS CONSULTANTS LLP has meticulously crafted a suite of services that cater to the multifaceted needs of modern enterprises. Our journey began with a simple yet profound goal: to make high-quality, professional business services accessible to companies of all sizes, from startups to multinational corporations. Today, FINMANNPRO BUSINESS CONSULTANTS LLP stands as a testament to the power of innovative solutions
top_product: Monthly Business Performance Report – A comprehensive report that gives entrepreneurs a 360° overview of their entire business operations. It provides clear insights into financial performance, internal controls, and key business indicators — helping business owners make informed decisions, identify growth opportunities, and build their business strategically month after month. This report acts as a financial dashboard that keeps entrepreneurs in control and on track toward sustainable growth.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is an entrepreneur or business owner who is passionate about growing their business but needs expert guidance in managing finances, internal controls, and tax compliance. I work best with: Small and medium business owners looking to streamline their accounts and ensure zero tax issues Startups wanting to set up strong financial and compliance systems from day one Established firms that need strategic financial consulting to improve profitability and structure Anyone who values transparency, sustainability, and long-term financial growth is an ideal client for me.
top_problem_solved: I help entrepreneurs who struggle with unclear financial data, compliance confusion, and weak internal controls. Most business owners focus on sales and operations but often lack a clear picture of where their business truly stands. I solve this by providing structured financial systems, insightful monthly reports, and proactive tax and compliance management — ensuring their business runs smoothly, transparently, and without tax worries. My approach helps them move from financial uncertainty to complete control and confidence in their business decisions.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI story is about a single referral I received from Kerala that eventually grew into a five-tier business opportunity — reaching all the way to Haryana. What started as one connection through BNI turned into a powerful chain of referrals, expanding my network, building strong client relationships, and proving how one quality referral can open doors across states and industries. This experience truly showed me the strength of BNI’s referral system — it’s not just about getting business; it’s about building trust that multiplies opportunities.

name: Minuraj R
company_address: Carlink, Opposite bmw showroom , chakka bypass., Trivandrum, Kerala 695024, trivandrum, kerala, 6955024
my_business: At Carlink Preowned Car Showroom, we believe owning your dream car should be simple, affordable, and trustworthy. We specialize in offering high-quality preowned cars that are carefully inspected, certified, and priced transparently.
top_product: These are the types of vehicles that people typically seek when shopping for pre-owned cars: Sedans: Ideal for families or professionals. Examples: Honda Accord, Toyota Camry, Hyundai Elantra SUVs & Crossovers: Great for customers needing more space, especially families or outdoor enthusiasts. Examples: Toyota RAV4, Honda CR-V, Ford Escape, Nissan X-Trail Luxury Vehicles: Attracts buyers looking for premium brands at a more affordable price. Examples: BMW 3 Series, Mercedes-Benz C-Class, Audi A4 Compact Cars: Often popular with first-time buyers, students, or urban drivers. Examples: Honda Civic, Toyota Corolla, Ford Fiesta Pickup Trucks: Popular in markets where work vehicles are needed or for customers needing a strong, durable car for hauling. Examples: Ford F-150, Toyota Hilux, Chevrolet Silverado Electric Vehicles (EVs): Gaining in popularity as more buyers opt for eco-friendly cars. Examples: Tesla Model 3, Nissan Leaf, Chevrolet Bolt EV
ideal_referral: Individuals looking to buy or sell pre-owned cars – Targeting people who are in need of a quality, reliable used car. Car Dealerships – Partnering with other car dealerships who may want to offload trade-ins or expand their inventory. Car Service Centers – Connections with businesses in the car maintenance and service space for cross-referrals (e.g., offering post-purchase services like vehicle inspection, repairs, etc.) Auto Finance Advisors/Companies – People who help customers with financing and loans for vehicles.
top_problem_solved: Car Quality & Trust: Every vehicle is thoroughly inspected and comes with a transparent history report — no hidden issues. Financing Made Easy: We offer flexible finance options, including support for customers with limited credit history. Right Car, Right Price: Wide range of quality cars at competitive, no-hassle prices — great value for money. Paperwork & Process: We handle all registration and ownership transfer paperwork for a smooth experience. Trade-In Convenience: Customers can easily exchange their old car at a fair market price.
my_favourite_bni_story: Personal Growth & Business Success My favorite BNI story is about how being part of BNI helped me grow Carlink beyond expectations. When I joined, I simply wanted to sell more pre-owned cars. But through the power of networking, I built genuine relationships, gained trusted referral partners, and earned clients who now refer others to me. BNI taught me that “Givers Gain” is not just a slogan — it truly works.

my_business: With over two decades of experience in the industrial marketing segment—especially in Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC)—I bring a deep understanding of the commercial HVAC landscape. top_product: Our top products are custom-designed cold rooms, commercial refrigeration systems, and advanced HVAC solutions, including VRF systems with round cassette indoor units and sleek one-way cassettes for low-ceiling spaces. We specialize in efficient HVAC design, ensuring optimal air distribution, energy-efficient operation, precise temperature control, and long-term reliability for hotels, bakeries, hospitals, and restaurants.
ideal_referral: Any commercial building with HVAC needs, Architects, Interior designers with whom our design can be worked out in tandem with their needs-for an ultimate customer satisfaction
